meanings.definition: In a manner related to heat or temperature.
meanings.sent1: The metal rod was thermically heated until it glowed red.
meanings.sent2: The oven was set to bake thermically at 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat thermically close to the fireplace, enjoying the warmth.
meanings.sent4: The sun warmed the earth thermically, bringing life to the plants.
meanings.sent5: The blanket retained heat thermically, keeping me cozy on the cold night.

meanings.definition: Using or involving heat or temperature.
meanings.sent1: The thermically insulated walls kept the room warm during winter.
meanings.sent2: The thermically conductive material quickly transferred heat from the stove.
meanings.sent3: The thermically sensitive thermometer reacted to the rising temperature.
meanings.sent4: The thermically controlled greenhouse provided ideal conditions for plant growth.
meanings.sent5: The thermically reactive substance changed color with changes in temperature.
